detail_desc: Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a small embroidery detail on the chest, collar with a contrasting colour lining, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a small embroidery detail on the chest, collar with a contrasting colour lining, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Single-breasted jacket in a woven fabric with notch lapels, long sleeves, a chest pocket and welt front pockets. Lined.
Short-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a turn-down collar, classic front, chest pocket and rounded hem. Easy-iron finish.
Short-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a turn-down collar, classic front, chest pocket and rounded hem. Easy-iron finish.

Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Set with a top and shorts. Top in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave with decorative pompoms on the front, short raglan sleeves and elastication around the neckline. Shorts in dobby-weave cotton with elastication at the waist and hems.
Dress in soft, printed cotton chambray with a collar, buttons at the top and long sleeves with a tab and button. Seam with a tie detail at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Cold shoulder dress in a patterned cotton weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and a gathered yoke. Short sleeves with elastication at the top, and a flounced hem.
Cold shoulder dress in a patterned cotton weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and a gathered yoke. Short sleeves with elastication at the top, and a flounced hem.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder body in soft, ribbed jersey with decorative buttons at the top, short raglan sleeves and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder body in soft, ribbed jersey with decorative buttons at the top, short raglan sleeves and concealed press-studs at the crotch.

Saddle bag in snakeskin-patterned imitation leather with a handle and detachable, adjustable shoulder strap with carabiner hooks. Flap with a metal fastener, and one inner compartment. Unlined. Size 10x21x25 cm.
Short-sleeved body in stretch jersey. V-neck with gathers at the front and press-studs at the crotch.
Short-sleeved body in stretch jersey. V-neck with gathers at the front and press-studs at the crotch.
Double-breasted jacket in a checked cotton weave with a gently rounded collar, sewn-on shoulder tabs and long sleeves with a tab at the cuffs. Long pleat at the back, and side pockets. Partly lined.

Trenchcoat in soft, stretch imitation suede with a small stand-up collar, decorative shoulder tabs and draped lapels. Loose yoke front and back, a detachable tie belt at the waist and welt side pockets. Unlined.
Long-sleeved wrap dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck with a flounce that continues down the front. Seam with ties under the bust, a gently flared skirt and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Long-sleeved wrap dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck with a flounce that continues down the front. Seam with ties under the bust, a gently flared skirt and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Soft, non-wired bras in cotton jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and lined, lace-trimmed cups that shape the bust and provide light support. Hook-and-eye fasteners at the back.
Jumper in a soft pattern knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with an extended waistband with a button, zip fly and an adjustable tab and button at the sides. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and slightly shorter legs with creases and turn-up hems. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Blouse woven in a patterned viscose blend with a small, pleated stand-up collar, ties at the neck, 3/4-length sleeves and narrow cuffs with a covered button.
Short, off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft, fluffy knit with a double-layered edge at the top, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves. No buttons.
NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Round-necked T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey with a print motif, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Round-necked T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey with a print motif, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Round-necked T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey with a print motif, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Shorts in lightweight, patterned cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist. Side pockets, a back pocket with a small fabric appliqué, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a low neckline and draped front.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs with quilted sections on the knees.

Oversized tunic in an airy cotton weave with a V-neck and a small stand-up collar with ties. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and wide flounces at the hem.
Wide maxi dress in airy, crinkled fabric with a drawstring around the neckline that ties at the back of the neck, and long balloon sleeves with a drawstring at the cuffs. Unlined.
Short, wide shorts in a viscose weave with a high, elasticated, frill-trimmed waist and side pockets.
Kaftan in airy, patterned crinkled fabric with a V-neck, buttons down the front, concealed pockets in the side seams and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Leather mesh bag with a matching clutch bag. Two handles at the top and a flat base. Size approx. 32x50 cm.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with an extra-high waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with an extra-high waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.

Pull-on jeans in supersoft denim with a drawstring waist, and zip fly and press-stud. Side pockets, back pockets and slim legs with straight hems.
Pull-on jeans in supersoft denim with a drawstring waist, and zip fly and press-stud. Side pockets, back pockets and slim legs with straight hems.
Fitted dress in a rib-knit viscose blend with a ribbed neckline, decorative eyelets at the top, cut-out sections at the shoulders and long sleeves.

Maxi dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck front and back, narrow shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and a long skirt with high slits in the sides. Lined.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems. Print motif on the coin pocket and on the turn-ups at the hems.
Coat in a soft wool blend with notch lapels, raglan sleeves and buttons. Patch front pockets, a sewn-in waistband at the back and a back vent. Unlined.
Coat in a soft wool blend with notch lapels, raglan sleeves and buttons. Patch front pockets, a sewn-in waistband at the back and a back vent. Unlined.
Shirt in washed denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and long sleeves with press-stud cuffs.
Short skirt in washed, stretch cotton denim with a high, frill-trimmed waist and a detachable belt with a metal ring buckle at the front. Zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high waist, pleats and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high waist, pleats and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Jacket in soft pile with a jersey-lined hood, buttons down the front and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs.
Short dressing gown in satin with a lace yoke at the back and on the shoulders, short, wide sleeves with a lace trim, and a tie belt at the waist.
Short dressing gown in satin with a lace yoke at the back and on the shoulders, short, wide sleeves with a lace trim, and a tie belt at the waist.
Pyjama top and shorts in soft satin. V-neck cami top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and lace at the top. Short shorts with an elasticated waist and lace details at the sides.
Pyjama top and shorts in soft satin. V-neck cami top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and lace at the top. Short shorts with an elasticated waist and lace details at the sides.
Long nightshirt in soft cotton flannel with notch lapels, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pocket, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Dungarees in washed stretch denim with press-studs at the sides and adjustable straps with metal fasteners. Chest pocket, side pockets, back pockets and a fake fly.
Boots in patterned imitation leather with a zip in one side, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
